adDetails: Travelling to Germany soon? Did you know English and German are sister languages? Did you know German is the business language of Europe? Perhaps you are just curious about this fascinating language. If so , come and learn how to order food, ask directions, and start a simple conversation. This course teaches German in a fun and interactive way. Our course will prepare you for key points during travel, and will begin a life-long connection to one of the oldest and greatest languages in the world! We offer class room setting and individual tutoring. $45.00 per session.
